00007  *  This class is used for showing the page of the story

00010 #include <fstream>
00011 
00012 #include "CHelp.h"
00013 #include "../../fileio/CExeFile.h"
00014 #include "../../common/CMapLoader.h"
00015 #include "../../graphics/CGfxEngine.h"
00016 #include "../../sdl/CVideoDriver.h"
00017 #include "../../sdl/CInput.h"

00019 
00020 CHelp::CHelp(CExeFile &ExeFile, const std::string &type) :
00021 mp_TextViewer(NULL)
00022 {
00023  std::string Text;
00024  std::string DataDirectory = ExeFile.getDataDirectory();
00025  char episode = ExeFile.getEpisode();
00026  
00027  // Read the Storytext
00028  if(type == "Game")
00029  {
00030   if(episode==1)
00031   {
00032    // We suppose that we are using version 131. Maybe it must be extended
00033    std::string filename = DataDirectory;
00034    if(DataDirectory != "")
00035     filename += "/";
00036    
00037    filename += "helptext.ck1";
00038    
00039    std::ifstream File; OpenGameFileR(File, filename, std::ios::binary);
00040    
00041    if(!File) return;
00042    
00043    while(!File.eof())
00044     Text.push_back(File.get());
00045    
00046    File.close();
00047    Text.erase(Text.size()-1);
00048   }
00049   else
00050   {
00051    // Here the Text file is within the EXE-File
00052    unsigned long startflag=0, endflag=0;
00053    unsigned char *text_data = NULL;
00054    
00055    
00056    if(!ExeFile.getHeaderData()) return;
00057    
00058    if(episode == 2)
00059    {
00060     startflag = 0x15DC0;
00061     endflag = 0x1659F;
00062    }
00063    else // Episode 3
00064    {
00065     startflag = 0x17BD0;
00066     endflag = 0x1839B;
00067    }
00068    
00069    text_data = ExeFile.getRawData();
00070    
00071    for(unsigned long i=startflag ; i<endflag ; i++ )
00072     Text.push_back(text_data[i]);
00073   }
00074  }
00075  else
00076  {
00077   std::string filename = "HELPTEXT.CKP";
00078 
00079   std::ifstream File; OpenGameFileR(File, filename, std::ios::binary);
00080 
00081   if(!File) return;
00082 
00083   while(!File.eof())
00084    Text.push_back(File.get());
00085 
00086   File.close();
00087   Text.erase(Text.size()-1);
00088  }
00089 
00090  // Create the Text ViewerBox and stores the text there!
00091  mp_TextViewer = new CTextViewer(g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface, 0, 8, 320, 160);
00092  mp_TextViewer->loadText(Text);
00093 }
00094 
00095 void CHelp::process() {
00096  // NOTE: Animation is performed here too, because the story plane is drawn over the other
00097  // map that is open. That is desired!
00098 
00099  if(mp_TextViewer)
00100  {
00101   mp_TextViewer->process();
00102   if(mp_TextViewer->hasClosed())
00103    m_destroy_me=true;
00104  }
00105  else
00106   m_destroy_me=true;
00107 }
00108 
00109 CHelp::~CHelp() {
00110  delete mp_TextViewer;
00111 }
